books.author: by Delia Owens
books.description: In a quiet town on the North Carolina coast in 1969, a young woman who survived alone in the marsh becomes a murder suspect.
books.name: WHERE THE CRAWDADS SING

books.author: by Dolly Parton and James Patterson
books.description: A singer-songwriter goes to Nashville seeking stardom but is followed by her dark past.
books.name: RUN, ROSE, RUN

books.author: by Janet Evanovich
books.description: When her family’s home is threatened, Gabriela Rose goes with her ex-husband to seek lost treasure in the jungles of Peru.
books.name: THE RECOVERY AGENT

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: A battered wife raised in a violent home attempts to halt the cycle of abuse.
books.name: IT ENDS WITH US

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: Lowen Ashleigh is hired by the husband of an injured writer to complete her popular series and uncovers a horrifying truth.
books.name: VERITY

books.author: by Stuart Woods
books.description: The 61st book in the Stone Barrington series. Transporting secret cargo sends Stone on an adventure on both sides of the Atlantic.
books.name: A SAFE HOUSE

books.author: by Taylor Jenkins Reid
books.description: A movie icon recounts stories of her loves and career to a struggling magazine writer.
books.name: THE SEVEN HUSBANDS OF EVELYN HUGO

books.author: by Jacqueline Winspear
books.description: The 17th book in the Maisie Dobbs series. Dobbs works to uncover a plot that jeopardizes the safety of Eleanor Roosevelt.
books.name: A SUNLIT WEAPON

books.author: by Anne Tyler
books.description: The ups and downs of a Baltimore family from the 1950s to the pandemic present.
books.name: FRENCH BRAID

books.author: by Harlan Coben
books.description: The second book in the Wilde series. Questions surface when Wilde connects with family members who have been out of his life.
books.name: THE MATCH

books.author: by Lucy Foley
books.description: Jess has suspicions about her half-brother’s neighbors when he goes missing.
books.name: THE PARIS APARTMENT

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: Tate Collins and Miles Archer, an airline pilot, think they can handle a no strings attached arrangement. But they can't.
books.name: UGLY LOVE

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: Is Ben using his relationship with Fallon as fodder for his novel?
books.name: NOVEMBER 9

books.author: by C.J. Box
books.description: The 22nd book in the Joe Pickett series. A fishing guide’s murder, stolen falcons and a Nazi official’s photo album heighten the danger.
books.name: SHADOWS REEL

books.author: by Ali Hazelwood
books.description: A young professor agrees to pretend to be a third-year Ph.D. candidate’s boyfriend.
books.name: THE LOVE HYPOTHESIS
